Description: This incredible South facing split level in Huntington Heights is nestled in one of Arvada's most desirable neighborhoods with breathtaking City Views.  Southern exposure allows for a light filled open living space accented by a beautiful brick fireplace where you can spread out comfortably and entertain your guests.  Take in Denver's Skyline from the comfort of your living room, extended dining room, and covered front deck ideal for sipping your morning coffee and watching the sunrise.  The view of the city lights at night can't be forgotten as well.  Tastefully updated kitchen includes high end luxury vinyl plank flooring, soft close drawers and cabinets with pull-out shelving, granite countertops, backsplash, recessed lighting, and pantry.  Custom built-ins give the home that mid-mod feel and allows for you to display your finest dinnerware.  Newly remodeled main level master suite boasts a large walk-in closet, 5 piece owners bath featuring spa-like jacuzzi soaking tub, double sinks, and top of the line shower system.  Updated powder room with bidet.  Downstairs offers an additional cozy living space with a fireplace, 2 more bedrooms, 3/4 bath, laundry room with washer and dryer included, and plenty of storage.  Mature landscaping consists of a variety of fruit trees and expansive garden area with hail resistant netting, offering a serene and private backyard setting for you to enjoy Colorado living at its best.  Adorable potting shed adds charm and is a gardeners dream.  Entertain on the 26x12 trex deck with custom railing.  Newer Roof, Boiler, and Tankless Hot Water Heater.  Just minutes from Historic Olde Town's shopping, dining, light rail, and more! Truly an opportunity not to be passed up!

Fully remodeled ground level condo in the highly sought-after Heather Ridge community and Cherry Creek school district! The kitchen boasts custom soft close cabinets, high-end granite countertops, pendant lights, an extra deep sink with high tech faucet, stainless steel appliances, and canned lighting. The flooring is laminate and thick carpet with tempurpedic padding. Two ceiling fans add year around comfort, and they are reversible for winter. The cozy wood burning fireplace is perfect for the cold months. New double pained windows and sliding glass door leading out to covered patio. Spacious bedroom with a large redesigned closet. New bathroom with custom soft close cabinets, spacious shower with massage shower-head, custom tile and added nook for soaps and shampoo. Added bonus: All popcorn removed from ceilings! Located close to almost everything including shopping, restaurants, schools, parks. Prime location with easy access to I-225, DTC, Denver Airport and downtown Denver. Just minutes to Denver RTD rail system that operates 365 days a year! Showings start Friday.

This unique, fully remodeled 1124 sq ft sturdy ranch home features 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and two workshops. Every surface of this home has been touched during this architect-designed renovation. The open concept living room opens to the gourmet kitchen with soft-close cabinets, top-line stainless LG smart appliances, gas range, pot-filler, oversized farm sink, leathered porcelain counters and six-foot center island with quartzite slab. Dining room features tongue and groove wood ceiling with cove lighting and hidden-storage seating. From the dining room, a sliding glass door opens to a spacious patio looking out to the backyard and mountains. The original oak floors were refinished. Wi-fi connected dimming light switches, appliances, Nest thermostat, smoke/Co2 detectors. USB B-C adapters integrated in many wall outlets. Ring alarm system with exterior lights/cameras. All new wiring and electric with energy efficient soft LED recessed fixtures and accent lighting features. Ceiling fans in all bedrooms. New furnace with central A/C. All plumbing replaced and new sewer line. Custom tile work in kitchen & bathrooms. Powered anti-fog backlit vanity mirrors in both bathrooms. Two sun-tunnels fill interior spaces with natural light. New HE windows and patio doors and new roof. Convenient 144 sq foot downstairs storage area just off kitchen. New LG wash-tower. The workshop has new utility connections and is ready to be finished, with new roof and stucco exterior to match the house.

This stunning 1970’s Pine Valley home has been professionally updated with no detail spared. This is not a fix and flip. The home has designer colors, hickory floors throughout and thoughtful modern amenities. The beautiful open kitchen was expanded to house an oversized island, coffee bar and appliance wall. The kitchen was appointed with grey cabinets that have soft close design and pull-out drawers, quartz counters, and custom lighting fixtures. The large windows pour in light and give an open view to the meticulously landscaped backyard. The kitchen opens to the dining with wainscoting details and a new sliding door. There is a large living room with vaulted ceilings at the front of the home. The lower level has a cozy fireplace with a custom wood mantle and real barn wood details. There is a wet bar or second kitchen for future mother in law space, large bedroom, updated bathroom with walk in shower. Upstairs you will find a true primary bedroom with a stunning 5 piece ensuite, heavenly soaking tub and two closets, one that is walk in. There are two additional large bedrooms, a fully remodeled bathroom, utility room and storage. The owners have gone above and beyond in installing systems including a brand new roof, new gutters, two furnaces and two ac units as well as a tankless hot water heater. They have also had the home professionally painted, new doors and a new garage door installed. The yard has a brand new concrete patio poured, newer pergola and a storage shed. The owners paid in full for the solar which will be a huge savings to the next buyer.  It dots the i’s and crosses the t’s of any buyers wish list by finishing up with a large two car garage. The home is walking distance to George Wallace Park and minutes to Belleview Square Shopping Center, Cherry Creek State Park and the Denver Tech Center.

Welcome to this beautiful remodeled 3 bedroom 2 bathroom Victorian home.  When you open the front door you are greeted with high ceilings, gleaming hardwood floors . As you enter the main living space you will see exposed brick and an open concept. There is 1 bedroom and a bathroom on the main floor. In the kitchen you have beautiful new soft close white shaker cabinets, quartz countertops, new appliances with a smart hub refrigerator and a península to enjoy.  The laundry room is on the main level and there is also an amazing bathroom with a walk-in shower. As you go upstairs you have amazing black powder coated stair railings and hardwood stairs. Upstairs you have two bedrooms, a bathroom with a dual vanity and an amazing walk-in shower. Outside you have a private fenced backyard with new sod, and 2 private parking spaces in back. New high efficiency furnace, a/c and water heater. This home has an outstanding centralized location. A few blocks away and you're in the heart of RINO. Quick access to downtown Denver. Close to shopping. An amazing house in the heart of Denver. Come see for yourself.

Stunning 1940's brick ranch, remodeled in 2018, and located in the Montclair neighborhood of Denver! As you enter, hardwood floors greet your feet & flow throughout the main floor. The main level floor plan has been opened up with the addition of structural beams during the remodel. The great room & kitchen flow seamlessly together making it great for entertaining, or any layout flexibility. The kitchen is a chef's dream! It boasts black granite countertops, 42" white soft-close cabinets, white dimensional subway tile backsplash, wood-look tile floors, Bosch stainless steel appliances, including a 5-burner gas range. The attached garage was converted into an inviting and cozy, sunken family room with vaulted ceilings & skylight. 2 bedrooms on the main floor have charcoal gray solid-core doors, carpeted floors, and single closets. The uniquely designed full bathroom features black & white decorative floor tile, black marble countertops, and completes the main floor. The basement holds the master suite, auxiliary bedroom, laundry room, and utility closet. The spacious master suite includes an open sitting area with gas fireplace, a 5-piece master bathroom, and a walk-in closet with built-in folding table. The master bathroom welcomes you with striking Carrara marble countertops, tile floors, and tile half wall. The shower stall includes a pebble floor, bench, glass door, and marble tile surround. Both basement bedrooms feature solid-core doors & carpeted floors. The large laundry room has wood-look laminate floors, granite countertops, utility sink, and soft-close cabinetry. The backyard includes a stamped concrete patio, new fencing, storage shed, professional landscaping, and an oversized 2-car garage that includes a 2nd fridge & built-in shelving. Less than a mile to grocery, banking, brewery, restaurants, and Montclair Park with tennis courts, horseshoe pits, and more. 2 miles to City Park, Denver Zoo, the Museum of Nature & Science, and Lowry Plaza. Welcome Home!
